lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: Hey![pause:0.5] I have some [i]important[/i] questions for you...

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: [speed:normal]First...[pause:0.5] do you know what [type:word, eng:fridge, jpn:冷蔵庫] means?

lines.speaker: Yuka
lines.text: Yeah.[pause:1.0] It’s where you keep [type:word, eng:cake, jpn:ケーキ].

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: [speed:slow][i]Hmm... interesting.[/i] [speed:normal][type:phrase, eng:Did you eat it, jpn:食べたの]?
